## 6.

      set.seed(50)
      xVec <- sample(0:999, 250, replace=T)
      yVec <- sample(0:999, 250, replace=T)
      yminusx <- yVec[-1] - xVec[-length(xVec)]
      yminusx
```
###(b) Create the vector (sin(y1)/cos(x2),sin(y2)/cos(x3), . . . ,sin(ynâˆ’1)/cos(xn)).

```
